text: Ara tomadera ki hala ye, temara allahara rahe lara'i karacha na durbala se'i purusa, nari o sisudera pakse, yara bale, he amadera palanakarta! Amadigake e'i janapada theke niskrti dana kara; ekhanakara adhibasira ye, atyacari! Ara tomara paksa theke amadera jan'ya paksalambanakari nirdharana kare da'o ebam tomara paksa theke amadera jan'ya sahayyakari nirdharana kare da'o.
